text: CIP101 Calendar Steps of Main Activities Schedule I.TERM First ALL-CIP The weekend before the course start week specified in the SU Academic Calendar Overvisor Meeting During the university course start week The First Two Weeks of CIP101 During the first two weeks of the university course start CIP101 Project Presentations Within three days after the university Add-Drop week Supervisor Trainings For two weeks from the start of university courses CIP101 Project Registrations During the university Add-Drop week Project-Based Trainings for CIP Teams One week before the CIP101 fieldwork weeks Start of the Projects Starts the week after project selections and lasts approximately 12 weeks until the end of the term CIP Fair In the 6th week of the term, on a day suitable for an outdoor activity Supervisor Selections Applications start in the 11th week, and interviews are conducted in the following weeks Final Week of the Projects The week in which courses end, as specified in the SU Academic Calendar Semester Break II.TERM First ALL-CIP The weekend before the course start week specified in the SU Academic Calendar Overvisor Meeting During the university course start week The First Two Weeks of CIP101 During the first two weeks of the university course start CIP101 Project Presentations During the university Add-Drop week Supervisor Trainings For two weeks from the start of university courses CIP101 Project Registrations During the university Add-Drop week Project-Based Trainings for CIP Teams One week before the CIP101 fieldwork weeks Start of the Projects Starts the week after project selections and lasts approximately 12 weeks until the end of the term CIP Fair In the 9th week of the term, on a day suitable for an outdoor activity Supervisor Selections Applications start in the 11th week, and interviews are conducted in the following weeks Final Week of the Projects The week in which courses end, as specified in the SU Academic Calendar FCIP-A220-01-01
